node.title: Jubilant travellers cross into SA as drawbridge lowers to eastern states
node.description: For months an effective fortress with almost no COVID-19 cases, South Australia is now welcoming double-vaccinated travellers from NSW, Victoria and the ACT, with many expressing their delight.
node.content:
["Interstate travellers have begun pouring\u00a0into South Australia after\u00a0border restrictions were significantly relaxed from midnight to those who have been double-vaccinated.", "The SA-Victorian border was a hive of activity\u00a0as\u00a0dozens of vehicles\u00a0passed through the Bordertown COVID-19 checkpoint.", "Many had waited in line for hours\u00a0and were eager to be reunited with family and friends.", "\"It's finally all come together and I can go home.\u00a0It's so good, it's been a long time coming,\" one woman said.", "\"I came down to Victoria three months ago to look after my mother, who's been ill, and\u00a0I couldn't get back.\"", "South Australia's borders have been closed to COVID-hit\u00a0New South Wales, Victoria and the ACT for weeks.", "", "
Despite the high spirits, authorities have warned of \"inevitable\" transmission of the virus.(ABC News: Brant Cumming)
", "The November 23 deadline was announced last month as part of South Australia's COVID-Ready roadmap back to normality.", "Almost 30,000 travellers from NSW,\u00a0Victoria and the ACT have been approved to enter SA but many will need to undergo COVID-19 tests and monitor for symptoms.", "There were many smiles and waves as the stream of cars flowed through the checkpoint, with one jubilant driver saying he was \"very excited\" and his passenger saying he could not wait to \"celebrate\".", "", "
One of many delighted travellers who crossed into SA following the repeal of border restrictions.(ABC News)
", "\"It's great, good for the country and good for everyone to get going again,\" one traveller said.", "Others had more sombre reasons for heading over,\u00a0including one who said she was preparing to\u00a0attend a funeral.", "All travellers entering SA must register via the EntryCheck SA website, prove they have been double-vaccinated, and come from a council area with an 80 per cent double-dose rate.", "Other measures coming into effect include\u00a0the state's quarantine period for international travellers being halved from 14 days to seven, and a cap on home gatherings increasing from 20 people to 30.", "Authorities have repeatedly warned that, despite vaccination requirements, the relaxing of border restrictions will now make community transmission\u00a0\"inevitable\".", "South Australian authorities\u00a0predict about 13 deaths \u2014 but up to as many as 51 \u2014 in the months ahead.", "", "
Going overseas? Here's what you need to know
"]
